page.title: 12Shopping around Hungerford.
page.content: Our survey of Hungerford people shows a strong desire for more clothes shops ,especially selling children's clothes and a shoe shop.There was also a sizeable number who would like to see one of the chain stores e.g. Woolworth. Not surprisingly for goods not easily obtainable in Hungerford or for greater choice people travelled most often to Newbury or Swindon ,the nearest towns, although some travel as far as London .Only 2% used a shopping catalogue. The International at Hungerford is the most popular shop for weekly shopping .Only one person travels as far as Andover every week In deciding where to shop people rated choice ,lower prices ,quality convenience and service as equally important.
